headline: Is NRG Energy, Inc. (NRG) the Best Utility Stock to Buy According to Hedge Funds?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 12 Best Utility Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. In this article, we are going to take a look at where NRG Energy, Inc.
